name: Fantasy Mosaics 24: Deserted Island
description:
The penguins are heading to explore a deserted tropical island and make new discoveries!
The island inhabitants are interactive and waiting for you to play with them!
Enjoy the new challenges of this exciting installment of Fantasy Mosaics and help the penguins explore the island!


- Colorful mosaic puzzles

- Interactive island creatures

- Explore the deserted island

- Puzzles based on logic
